channel.title: About the Gauntlet Calendar category
channel.description:
Announcing, posting videos of, and discussion of Gauntlet Calendar games.
First posts in this category should be game announcements of calendared games. Discussion and linking of vids should happen in that thread.
It is recommended that you click the little circle at the top right to Watching First Post in this category so you are alerted when new sessions are posted. (Though not to replies, etc.)

item.dc:creator: @shane
